name: Brian Taylor
description: Welcome! I’m Brian Taylor, a Full Stack Developer focused on building scalable, visually appealing web applications. I create software solutions that balance functionality with design, working across the full stack to bring ideas to life.
fullstack: I develop web applications with modern technologies and have a solid grasp of key frameworks. My curiosity and commitment to lifelong learning keep me up-to-date with the latest in tech.
experience: I have experience with web applications, mobile apps, and APIs. I thrive in both team and solo projects, adapting quickly to fast-paced environments to meet deadlines.
backend: As a Back-End Developer, I specialize in building APIs and web services with modern technologies. I’m skilled in database management and data modeling, proficient in both SQL and NoSQL.
education: I have a certification in Software Engineering from a 500+ hour program focused on product development, object-oriented programming, MVC frameworks, data modeling, and teamwork.
interests: I'm passionate about technology and software development, and I continuously learn new technologies. I enjoy working on diverse projects and seek opportunities for growth.
softSkills: I possess excellent communication skills and collaborate effectively with both technical and non-technical teams. I am a fast learner, eager to grow, and enjoy working together to achieve shared goals.
